description:
Retrieves first item of the array.

Example:
1. [1,2]@0 received via `array`
2. 1@0 sent via `item`

More:
https://github.com/Cranq-io/cranq-tutorials/blob/main/reference/3_querying_data/3_1_getters/README.md#getting-the-first--last-array-elements

cfd3b3e7-80fb-464a-a923-f9fcb9555b0c.description:
Receives array to retrieve first item from.

Example:
[1,2]
cfd3b3e7-80fb-464a-a923-f9fcb9555b0c.name: array

f7832747-fb1e-432b-9c10-60ac76c110cc.description:
Sends first item of the array.

Example:
1
f7832747-fb1e-432b-9c10-60ac76c110cc.name: item

name: data/array/First item getter
